CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Effects Duration
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: how the remaining duration of magic effects and lights if this setting is true. The remaining duration is displayed in the tooltip by hovering over the magical effect.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Enchant Chance
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Whether or not the chance of success will be displayed in the enchanting menu.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Melee Info
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If this setting is true, melee weapons reach and speed will be shown on item tooltip.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Projectile Damage
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If this setting is true, damage bonus of arrows and bolts will be shown on item tooltip.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Change Dialogue Topic Color
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If this setting is true, dialogue topics will have a different color if the topic is specific to the NPC you're talking to or the topic was previously seen. Color can be changed in settings.cfg.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Stretch Menu Background
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Stretch menus, load screens, etc. to the window aspect ratio.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Can Zoom on Maps
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable zooming on local and global maps.
